name: Icreon Tech
overview:
Icreon Tech is a full services IT consulting and solutions firm dedicated to helping organizations leverage technology to drive efficiencies and gain a competitive edge. Based in New York, Icreon builds web and mobile-based solutions for clients ranging from medium sized businesses to global Fortune 500s.

At Icreon, we use technology to solve complex business problems. We are an IT services provider specializing in a variety of web and mobile-based technologies to empower organizations to be more efficient and profitable. Since our inception in January 2000, our formula for success has been simple – to bring businesses a technology differential, whether it be through design, development or consulting.

We are driven to deliver real value to our clients so we become more of a partner. We build effective systems and solutions and we stick around to ensure their effectiveness. We go all out on our client projects and take pride in our work because we realize that, that is our secret to our growth and the reason we are chosen over our competitors time and time again.
